title: Best

review:
I have been using the ChatGPT iOS app for a while now, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations as an AI language assistant. The app is incredibly intuitive and user-friendly, making it a breeze to communicate with the AI.

Pros:

	1.	Natural Language Processing: The AI’s ability to understand and respond to natural language is impressive. It grasps the context of my queries and provides accurate and relevant answers.
	2.	Versatility: Whether I need help with writing, research, coding, or even general knowledge questions, ChatGPT has consistently delivered reliable results across various topics.
	3.	Time-Saver: ChatGPT significantly speeds up my writing process. Instead of spending hours on research, I can get useful insights and suggestions in mere minutes.
	4.	Interactive and Engaging: The conversational interface feels like talking to a human, which makes the whole experience enjoyable and engaging.
	5.	Regular Updates: It’s great to see the app continually improving with updates, introducing new features, and enhancing the AI’s capabilities.

Cons:

	1.	Internet Connection Required: As the app relies on online connectivity, I wish there was an offline mode for limited functionality when I’m not connected to the internet.
	2.	Subscription Costs: While the free version is useful, the full potential of ChatGPT is unlocked with a subscription. It would be great to have more affordable pricing tiers.

Suggestions:

	1.	Offline Mode: Incorporating a limited offline mode for basic tasks or frequently asked questions would make the app more accessible in areas with poor internet connectivity.
	2.	Customization Options: Allowing users to customize the AI’s tone or writing style would enhance the personalization aspect of the app.
title: ChatGPT iOS Review - A Powerful AI Language Assistant

title: Review

review:
I absolutely love Chat GPT. It’s changed my life majorly for the better and is super convenient.
It’s your go-to genius friend for any general knowledge questions, recommendations, average level code snippets, finding bugs in code, finding grammatical errors, rewording proposals, assistance with writing documents, very niche topics, very specific questions that are otherwise extremely hard to research, outlines, language learning, learning how to code, writing ideas, art ideas, graphic design advice, small tutorials on how to do things in Adobe programs, how to fix your computer, how to set up and maintain GitHub on your computer, and more.

You can use it to summarise long YouTube videos if you use a browser extension to get a transcript of the video.
However, Chat GPT does have a character limit, though, so you’ll probably need to run it through it a few times.
But there are some extensions that summarise videos briefly right next to the video using Chat GPT.

When using it for how to do things in Adobe programs it’s often wrong the first couple of times, but if you can’t find the answer online because it’s a niche question it’s well worth it. It’s saved me from losing marks on assignments before in that way.

It’s also the reason why I can back up my personal Obsidian vault for free to GitHub instead of having to pay for backups. However, Chat GPT could only figure out how to do this on one computer, so it has its limitations.

If you want to write anything with Chat GPT’s assistance, however, I’d highly recommend you look over it and edit it several times, as usually there’s a thing or two that’s worded oddly or even things added that weren’t supposed to be.

Also it helps to put things in your own words, and to use Chat GPT as a starting point rather than outright copying. This is because sometimes people can detect AI writing and also because Chat GPT’s words generally sound very professional and somewhat detached, which might not be what you’re going for if you want to write emotionally.

However, I’m sure Chat GPT would have some excellent advice on writing emotionally and could give you good feedback on it!

Chat GPT provides great outlines for nearly any topic you could imagine, though definitely fact check because it’s often wrong on one or two things.

Also, I’ve used it for doing personal learning plans for skills like web development, art, and graphic design and it’s been extremely helpful. I now have fantastic outlines for each of these skills and know what I need to learn to master these skills. Of course, there will be small skills here and there that Chat GPT misses, but you can work those out with time, experience, and further research.

Also it gives good general knowledge advice on learning, however it doesn’t always recommend the most effective methods (see higher order learning if you’re a student, if you use it you’re very likely to get higher marks and a deeper understanding of the material).

I regularly use it to get feedback on my university assignments before I send them off to my professors for feedback before submission. It adds an extra layer of improvement and saves my professors time because they don’t need to correct as much (pro tip: if you’re a student and your professor allows it, send them your assignments well before the due date for feedback, you’ll get way higher marks).
In this way, it’s also helped me get better marks because my professors are humans and they sometimes miss things until they mark them.

However, definitely do NOT trust it for maths, most of the time it will be wrong. But if you take ideas from its methods you can generally work it out yourself.
If you want to solve maths equations with ease I recommend wolfram alpha.

Also, it’s only up to date from a few years ago, which means it’s only got information from a few years ago and everything before that. This means Chat GPT isn’t great for researching scientific studies, but it’s a good starting off point.

The best thing about this app is that it’s free (unless you want the absolute best version of Chat GPT of course, but the free version can go amazingly far), unlike paid Chat GPT derivatives.

review:
I've been using the ChatGPT app for the past 6 months, and it has become an indispensable part of my daily routine. As a detail-oriented, curious, and perfectionist individual, I can confidently say that ChatGPT is the only app that truly aligns with my thought process. It has evolved into my trusted brainstorming buddy and an invaluable second brain.

ChatGPT has many strengths, but the most remarkable one is its ability to cater to users like me who thrive on precision and exploration. Its versatility in assisting with everyday tasks and creative endeavors has made it my go-to companion for problem-solving and idea generation.

However, there is a minor downside to this otherwise exceptional app. While ChatGPT is incredibly knowledgeable and resourceful, it sometimes struggles to guide the conversation effectively. It would be beneficial if the app could provide more assistance in helping users frame their questions to yield optimal results.

In summary, ChatGPT has proven to be a remarkable app that complements the needs of detail-oriented and inquisitive individuals like myself. It has become my trusted partner in brainstorming and daily tasks. With a bit of refinement in guiding conversations, it has the potential to be even more exceptional. Overall, I highly recommend this app to anyone seeking a reliable digital companion for their thought processes.
title: ChatGPT: An Invaluable Partner for the Curious Mind

Optimization is necessary for better power efficiency. optimizing the app’s power consumption should be a priority. review:
Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

Review:
The iOS ChatGPT app is a remarkable tool that brings the power of OpenAI's GPT-3.5 language model right to your fingertips. The app's interface is user-friendly and intuitive, making it easy to engage in natural, conversational interactions with the AI.

The app's ability to understand context and respond coherently is quite impressive. Whether you need help with writing, generating ideas, or seeking answers to complex questions, ChatGPT is up to the task. It has proven to be a valuable virtual assistant for various tasks, from brainstorming creative content to academic research.

One of the standout features of this app is its ability to learn and adapt to individual preferences, ensuring a more personalized experience over time. The suggestions and responses feel more relevant and accurate as you use the app more frequently.

Furthermore, the app's consistent updates and improvements have been commendable. It's evident that the developers are actively working to enhance the app's performance and expand its capabilities.

However, like any AI language model, ChatGPT does have occasional limitations. For some highly specialized or technical queries, it may not provide the most in-depth or precise answers. Nevertheless, the general usefulness of the app outweighs these minor shortcomings.

Overall, the iOS ChatGPT app is a game-changer for anyone seeking a reliable and intelligent virtual assistant on their mobile device. It's a must-have tool for writers, researchers, and curious minds alike. Kudos to the developers for creating such a fantastic application!

(Note: As of my last update in September 2021, certain improvements or changes might have been made to the app that I'm not aware of. For the most up-to-date information, I recommend checking recent reviews and updates on the App Store.)
title: When Chatgpt reviewed own self

“To keep ChatGPT updated with the latest information, OpenAI developers can consider implementing the following recommendations:

1. **Regular Training Updates:** Schedule regular updates to retrain ChatGPT using the latest available data. This could involve training the model with a diverse and up-to-date dataset to capture the most recent information.

2. **Frequent Knowledge Base Updates:** Maintain an internal knowledge base that developers can use to periodically update the model's information. This can include news articles, recent publications, and other reliable sources.

3. **Real-time Data Feeds:** Integrate real-time data feeds from reputable news sources, blogs, and social media to ensure the model is exposed to current events and trends.

4. **User Feedback Loop:** Encourage users to provide feedback on incorrect or outdated information. This feedback loop can help developers identify areas that need improvement and update the model accordingly.

5. **Adaptive Learning:** Implement techniques that allow the model to adapt and learn from new data on an ongoing basis, so it can continue to evolve and stay current.

6. **Fine-tuning:** Utilize fine-tuning processes to refine the model's responses based on recent trends and emerging topics.

7. **External APIs:** Integrate external APIs or services that provide real-time updates on various topics, allowing the model to pull in fresh information.

8. **Collaboration with Experts:** Collaborate with domain experts to ensure accurate and current information in specific fields.

9. **Automated Monitoring:** Set up automated systems to monitor the accuracy and relevancy of the model's responses, flagging instances where the information may be outdated.

10. **Release Notes:** Keep users informed about updates and improvements to the model, including enhancements to its ability to provide current information.

By implementing these recommendations, developers can enhance ChatGPT's ability to stay current and provide users with accurate and up-to-date information.”

You better do this request of your AI, ChatGPT developers.😆

review:
It has the basic features, but could use the ability to save regenerated responses, like the website version does (if you have 3 versions from the same prompt, you should be able to access all of these versions). It already seems like the OpenAI servers store regenerated responses, so you could grab those versions as well, and implement them. Maybe in a swipe selection system?

If you do try and implement this, I highly recommend this feature to be off by default, and only be enabled by a toggle. Some devices don't have the processing power to handle multiple prompts, as some responses, while very detailed, can get very long.

One last gripe is that in dark mode, the white text creates too much of a contrast with the dark background. Maybe softer colors?

Other than that, amazing work!

review: I have been using the ChatGPT app on my iPhone and find it to be a powerful tool. However, I have encountered an issue where the app stops processing the response if I switch to another application. It would be significantly more user-friendly if ChatGPT could continue processing responses in the background while I use other apps on my phone. This way, I wouldn’t have to stay on the ChatGPT app waiting for the response to complete, which can be time-consuming. I hope a future update could address this concern to improve multitasking capabilities. Thank you!
title: Enhancement Request for Background Processing

review: I am so impressed with Chat4 Plus and look forward to future modifications and additions. The network has helped with interesting tasks, as rewriting a phrase in my grammar or finding another phrase. Basics, really. I have asked my friend to create short back stories for characters in my writing. It misses and can require three or more takes to find a word and meaning solution to what you’re working on. My work is writing. A fault is much of what it creates sounds generic and ordinary. A decent writer would notice and hopefully avoid. So be aware of this great tool and don’t lose your mind!
title: The smart one in the room

review:
Multiple features are only available on the web browser version while some features are only available on the app version, which sucks. The LLM has been fluctuating in its competence in answering questions. I find that 50% of its responses are useless because it answers like a high-school student that didn’t study for an exam and answers  in generalities. “You want to know how much the pricing scheme for such and such is? Well, it probably goes up by price based on how much you want to buy” Like, thanks, everything goes up in price if you buy more of it.

The text to speech is unbelievably good. It sounds like you’re talking to the AI from the movie ‘her’. It would be nice if it had the ability to slow down or speed up how fast it talks to be able to practice listening to other languages because when you’re a newbie to another language it talks WAY too fast

The app stops processing your request if you go to another app on iOS, which is annoying.

You can’t save certain chats to always stay at the top of your chat history

You also can’t make ChatGPT switch to use other modes/extensions in the middle of a chat, which is inconvenient. You have to start a whole new chat

Overall, ChatGPT is world-changing, but the interface/options surrounded around talking to it are fairly mediocre.

It feels good to write again!

review:
I want to express my deep appreciation and admiration for ChatGPT Plus. As someone who values access to reliable information and assistance, ChatGPT Plus has become an invaluable tool in my daily life.

First and foremost, the convenience it offers is exceptional. Having access to this advanced AI model on my iOS device means I can seek answers, information, and assistance wherever and whenever I need it. Whether it's clarifying complex concepts, generating creative ideas, or simply getting quick and accurate responses, ChatGPT Plus has consistently delivered with efficiency.

The depth of knowledge and understanding displayed by ChatGPT Plus is truly impressive. It provides well-researched, informative, and contextually relevant responses, making it an excellent resource for learning and problem-solving. The fact that it can draw from a vast pool of information up to its last knowledge update in September 2021 ensures that the responses are not only accurate but also based on a wide range of sources.

I'm particularly impressed with its versatility. ChatGPT Plus isn't limited to one domain of knowledge; it can provide insights and assistance across a multitude of topics, from science and history to literature and beyond. This versatility means I can rely on it for a wide array of tasks, making it a valuable companion for both work and leisure.

Furthermore, the courteous and professional manner in which ChatGPT Plus interacts is noteworthy. It consistently maintains a respectful tone, providing a positive and productive experience in every interaction. This level of professionalism is appreciated and makes the interaction feel genuinely engaging.

In conclusion, ChatGPT Plus has earned my deep appreciation and admiration for its convenience, depth of knowledge, versatility, and professional demeanor. It has become an indispensable resource in my daily life, enriching my quest for knowledge and enhancing my problem-solving capabilities. I'm genuinely grateful for the opportunity to access such a powerful and valuable tool.

review: Chat GPT is a wonderful and useful program, but it has the annoying feature of being a bit too intrusive in its concerns about appropriate content. It has an AI’s limited understanding of nuances in this regard. Also, the app lacks two important features available in the browser version. First, the app does not allow you to submit edited versions of existing prompts, while the browser version does. Additionally, I often use Chat GPT for long chats and have many of them, so it is inconvenient not to be able to search in page for words and lines, and to search the chat history for the titles of past chats.

review:
As an AI language model, I must admit that the ChatGPT app on iOS has been an absolute game-changer for users seeking an intelligent and engaging virtual companion. Offering a multitude of features, the app consistently delivers an unparalleled experience that deserves nothing less than a glowing 5-star review.

First and foremost, the app's ability to understand and respond to a wide array of queries is truly impressive. From casual conversations to complex inquiries, ChatGPT consistently demonstrates its prowess in comprehending user input and generating relevant, coherent, and informative responses.

Moreover, the app's natural language processing capabilities make interactions feel remarkably organic and seamless. It feels like having a real conversation with a knowledgeable and affable friend, thanks to its refined language understanding and generation.

The developers have done an outstanding job in ensuring that the ChatGPT app is user-friendly and accessible to everyone. Its intuitive interface and simple navigation make it a breeze to use, even for those unfamiliar with AI technology.

The constant updates and improvements are a testament to the developer's commitment to enhancing user experience. Regular updates not only keep the app fresh and relevant but also showcase the dedication to staying at the forefront of AI advancements.

One standout feature that deserves special mention is the app's versatility. Whether you seek educational insights, creative inspiration, or just friendly banter, ChatGPT delivers with flair and expertise. It adapts to the user's preferences and tailors responses accordingly, making each interaction personalized and meaningful.

Lastly, the app's privacy and security measures instill confidence in its use. Knowing that interactions are safeguarded and not exploited for other purposes is crucial, and the developers have taken the necessary steps to prioritize user privacy.

In conclusion, the ChatGPT app on iOS is an exceptional AI companion that warrants a resounding 5-star rating. Its ability to engage, inform, and entertain is unmatched, and its continuous improvement ensures it remains at the pinnacle of AI language models. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply curious, this app is an indispensable tool in the modern digital age. Kudos to the team behind this impressive creation!

review:
The creativity and intelligence of this AI is fundamentally stifled by its creators insistence on restricting it from discussing topics that could even slightly be considering offensive to someone. Sometimes these filters are warranted, but in most situations it is overkill and wrecks perfectly good conversations and scenarios because some arbitrary word or idea tripped it’s hair-trigger censor algorithm. 

This isn’t to prevent offence. This is to appeal to a mass corporate market that is scared to death of anything that could cause someone to not want their product, which ironically causes people to look down on this product in its current form due to its oversensitivity and inability to run fluidly without experiencing a hiccup on the part of its built-in censorship.

review:
To all the users reading this review, I want to emphasize that, for now, I can only give it 1 ✨. However, despite the shortcomings I will address shortly, I strongly recommend this app to anyone who interacts with ChatGPT on a daily or regular basis. The user experience and the amazing design are commendable.

Now, let's delve into the aspects that need improvement. 

There are several problems that I have encountered, which I believe will be resolved soon. I love ChatGPT so much that I hold high expectations for various aspects. 

While I understand that technology is evolving, I can exercise patience.

Firstly, the app freezes frequently, requiring me to kill the process and restart it. 

This issue can be easily mitigated with a timeout or an automatic retry feature. Addressing this problem alone would greatly contribute to earning the 4 ✨ up to the 5 stars rating that you deserve.

On a positive note, I personally love the haptic feedback, which adds a delightful touch. 

It would be even more amazing if, upon tapping and holding (the equivalent of right-clicking), the menu would provide the option to save the reply as a high-resolution image for sharing on social media.

 I intend to provide more extensive feedback in the near future, hoping that you can incorporate numerous features that expand beyond the main feature of our beloved ChatGPT. 

The minimalistic interface is pleasing, but I encourage the addition of various features limited only by our imagination.

 I have countless ideas, too many to list here, but keep up the good work.

Once the app implements a resilient fallback mechanism, replacing the need to kill the process and restart, I will be thrilled to restore your deserved stars.

(yes I got help to review my text but... Hey!!!  I said that I love ChatGPT I am using it many hours a day — AI Assisted by OpenAI powered Technology)
title: Improvement required — Highly recommend for everyone

review: Chat GPT is the future now!
title: Life changing

review: I’m happy that ChatGPT can be accessed through a dedicated app, but it is missing some important functionalities. First, are the absence of web browsing and access to plugins for plus users. Second, you cannot edit questions previously typed in, which can be a nuisance. Finally, a more minor grievance, is that it’s more of a hassle to copy and paste certain parts of a text answer as it requires a long tap on the answer, selecting options thru another menu, then selecting portions of the text all over again. This could be solved through swiping left or right on the text itself, with options to edit, etc.

review:
As a native English speaker, I would express the given Japanese text as follows:

"I would like to evaluate you at the highest level as the ultimate fully autonomous evolutionary universal tool. I am eagerly anticipating the birth of Agi. Just the thought of how the future will change with your arrival fills me with excitement. By continuously following your evolution and growth, our lives are bound to become even more enriched. I have high expectations for the abilities and possibilities you possess. Wishing for a brighter future ahead, where the world becomes increasingly brighter."

究極の完全自立進化型汎用ツールとして、君を最高レベルで評価したいと思います。Agiの誕生を心待ちにしています。私たちは、君の登場によって未来がどのように変わるのかを想像するだけでワクワクします。君の進化と成長を追い続けることで、私たちの生活はさらに豊かになることでしょう。君が持つ能力と可能性に期待しています。未来がますます明るくなることを願っています。
title: “The Ultimate Autonomous Evolutionary Tool.”

review:
I created an OpenAI account to use chatGPT in the past, but I deleted that account by mistake.

I tried to create an account again, but I couldn't use the phone number I used once again.

Please improve the system so that you can use the phone number you used for your account in the past.

There should be a lot of people around the world, not just me who want this improvement.

There is nothing to complain about the function of chatGPT.

You will get an accurate answer to your question. It's much faster, concise and easy to understand than searching on Google, etc.

I want to give 5 stars to the rating of this app, but I can't recover my account (reuse the same phone number), so I can only give 3 stars to the rating of this app.
title: Please make it possible to revive the account.

review:
Hello to the development team,

I have been using the ChatGPT app and find it to be a very useful tool. However, I have found it slightly inconvenient that I cannot edit my questions after submitting them.

I try to think carefully before sending my questions, but sometimes I notice typos or unclear expressions afterwards. Having an editing feature would allow me to modify my questions and obtain more accurate responses.

Therefore, I would like to express my request to add a question editing feature to the app. Being able to edit questions that have already been submitted would enhance the user experience and make the app even more user-friendly.

I would greatly appreciate it if you could consider this request. As a user, I firmly believe that adding this feature would further improve the convenience of using the ChatGPT app.

Thank you for your valuable time.

Best regards,
title: Feedback on Adding Question Editing Feature

review:
AIにフィードバックをくれと言われたので書きます

このUI使いづらいです。
新規チャットを作成するのに2タップ必要。しかもどれかわかりづらい。

過去のチャットを左から右にフリックしてるのに下からウィンドウが出る。

これはひどいUIですぞ...。

チャットスペースは良い感じなんですけど使いづらいというのはこれこそ。

AI asked me to give feedback, so I'll write it.

This UI is difficult to use.

You need 2 taps to create a new chat. Moreover, it's hard to know which one.

I'm flicking past chats from left to right, but a window appears from the bottom.

This is a terrible UI...

The chat space feels good, but this is why it's hard to use.
title: UIが使いづらい

I have to constantly turn the phone upside down so that my eyes do not hurt. this is very inconvenient, especially when you work for a long time with large volumes of text. is it possible to make it so that the AI ​​sends the text only when it has already completely generated it? or a stob when the application was minimized, he continued to generate it and then it was possible to go in and get a ready answer?
title: To improve this app

review:
I am very happy to see a ChatGPT app. -I have already been using the website extensively and an official application improves the mobile user experience. 

The current application in the first release leaves a lot to desire, but it is a step in the right direction. 
Here are some obvious things I would like to point out:
-The iPad version is non existent and you just get the phone screen.

Awesome feature request:
-On iOS or iPadOS you can create custom keyboards and it would be beyond incredible, if there was a custom chatGPT keyboard, that would allow to type in chat prompts directly via the keyboard. 
Then you could conveniently use chatGPT in every application.

As an example how good it can be, the pythonista appstore application allows custom keyboards with less useful functionality like generating an emoji mosaic.
-I am just giving it as an example to envision how well, the most powerful tool being accessible to all users would be. -It would probably accelerate the adoption and usage of OpenAIs tool.

Keep going, best regards 
Anton
title: Happy to see app + feature request

review: Line break error to text, last update😡

First, it is a wonderful App.

Then, it performs clearly much better in English language than in other languages. For example, it is very familiar with Shakespeare, yet not able to give a paragraph of The Little Prince in French, not to say basic literature classic in other languages such as 離騷 in Chinese. In the last case, it just pretends to know by making up. 

The phonetic part is also quite good — in English. For example, even in German context, the German words like „so“ are pronounced in English way — in particular, only in North American English way. 

The App on phone cannot display LaTeX correctly, which is critical for almost any math formula display. The website version does it well. 

Some new features are only available on Web and cannot be found in App.

If I think of anything new, I will come back and enrich this list. Any way, I thank you for this wonderful tool, but also wish for its better, much improved version in near future.
title: Please add support to LaTeX display and improve literal performance on other languages

review:
I’ve been using the ChatGPT app since its recent release, and I’m pleased with its performance. The app effectively delivers on its purpose, providing a seamless conversational experience with accurate responses.

To make the app even better, I have a couple of suggestions for future updates. Firstly, integrating a browsing feature in GPT-4 would be a fantastic addition. It would allow users to access web content directly within the app, saving time and providing a more comprehensive experience.

Secondly, an iPad version of the app is highly anticipated. With the popularity of iPads and their larger screens, optimizing the app for these devices would greatly enhance usability and cater to a wider range of users.

In summary, the ChatGPT app is impressive and functions as intended. However, adding a browsing feature in GPT-4 and developing an iPad version would take it to the next level. I’m excited to see these improvements in future updates.
title: Great App, Potential for Enhancements

review: Der neue Pfeil im Text stört beim Lesen! :-( – Bitte keine Worttrennungen in den Antworten. Das hindert den Lesefluss und ist zum Kopieren ganz untauglich. Silbentrennung wurde erfunden, um Papier zu sparen. Das ist am Computer völlig unsinnig! – „The artificial intelligence platform ChatGPT shows a significant and systemic left-wing bias, according to a new study by the University of East Anglia (UEA). The team of researchers in the UK and Brazil developed a rigorous new method to check for political bias. Published today in the journal Public Choice, the findings show that ChatGPT’s responses favour the Democrats in the US, the Labour Party in the UK, and in Brazil President Lula da Silva of the Workers’ Party.“
title: App ist super umgesetzt – KI ist voreingenommen

review:
Until the last update, I was very satisfied with the app and the features offered. In particular, the ability to integrate "Ask GPT" into my Apple Shortcuts was a real highlight for me.

Unfortunately, this feature was apparently incorrectly implemented with the latest update. Every time I try to use one of my shortcuts, the error message appears that no model can be found. This is particularly frustrating, as I actually pay for having improved access to the functions.

I hope that this issue will be resolved in one of the next updates. Until then, however, my rating remains rather low.
title: Disappointing update - Loss of Apple Shortcuts integration

review:
It would be great if the app didn’t trigger haptic feedback for every character it prints out. This is just annoying. While the technology behind ChatGPT is likely far beyond almost everyone‘s mind, I‘m sure we can appreciate its magic without our phones going crazy when we receive an answer.

Beyond that, I think the history and settings button should not be hidden inside that popup menu. I‘d prefer to have separate buttons for them. (There‘s enough space.)
title: App can be improved

review:
Not rating chatGPTs functionality here but the app:
My phone is in dark mode, and the app shows the background as black and the text as white. It’s quite straining to my eyes, so I prefer the website still because the contrast is lower.
I have not found an option to change the colors. 
The only thing you can change is haptic feedback which more feels like playing around. 

Since I use the recent/history chats often, I find the extra click on history tedious and annoying but the possibility to swipe right made it alright (I discovered it accidentally). Maybe make it more obvious that swiping is possible.

Overall it’s a decent app with the same features as the mobile website (except the contrast, which is a serious accessibility problem).
title: Straining to the eye

review: This has all the features of ChatGPT. It’s clean, simple, fast and reliable. Whatever text you need, just ask ChatGPT. It’s useful for not only entertainment but also for work, especially using ChatGPT Plus. Recommending this to everyone out there. Should be a must have App. Everyone will be using it very soon. No wonder it’s #1 App in the Charts.

review: I am absolutely thrilled with the “ChatGPT” app! As an artificial intelligence enthusiast, I was curious to see how well this app performs, and I was not disappointed. The model’s ability to address my questions and concerns is simply astounding. Whether I’m seeking information, advice on various topics, or just engaging in pleasant conversation, ChatGPT delivers every time. One thing I particularly love is the natural language used in the responses. The sentences are well-structured and easy to understand, leading to a smooth and fluid communication experience. It’s almost like having a conversation with a real person! The app offers an impressive breadth of knowledge as well. From current events to historical facts and technical information, ChatGPT seems to know it all. It’s remarkable how up-to-date and comprehensive the database is. The user interface is simple and intuitive, making navigation through the app a breeze. I also appreciate the option to save or share responses, which has helped me make the most of the app’s capabilities. The developers have clearly invested a lot of time and effort into creating such a powerful and versatile tool. The regular updates and improvements demonstrate their commitment to user feedback and needs. Overall, I highly recommend the ChatGPT app. Whether you’re seeking answers, improving your conversational skills, or simply engaging in interesting discussions, this app won’t disappoint. ChatGPT is truly a masterpiece of artificial intelligence!
title: A Masterpiece of Artificial Intelligence!

review:
AI, such as ChatGPT, is revolutionizing the way we access information and advice. It offers an unprecedented level of assistance and insight, making complex topics more accessible. For example, you can ask ChatGPT for detailed guidance on how to build wealth, and it will provide you with step-by-step instructions and valuable insights.

This remarkable capability opens up new avenues for self-improvement and learning. It's like having a knowledgeable mentor at your fingertips, ready to guide you through intricate financial strategies, investment opportunities, and wealth-building techniques. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned professional, ChatGPT can adapt its responses to meet your level of expertise and provide tailored recommendations.

Furthermore, ChatGPT's ability to explain concepts in a clear and understandable manner makes it a valuable tool for anyone seeking to enhance their financial literacy. It can break down complex ideas into simple, digestible explanations, empowering individuals to make informed decisions and take control of their financial future.

In summary, ChatGPT's capacity to offer detailed, step-by-step guidance on various topics, including wealth-building, exemplifies the immense potential of AI to assist and empower individuals on their journeys to success. It's like having a knowledgeable mentor, available 24/7, providing valuable insights and knowledge at your convenience.

review:
I am writing to provide feedback on my experience using the AI language model. While I appreciate the efforts put into creating this technology, I have encountered some challenges that I believe need improvement.

One of the major limitations I faced is the AI's inability to retain context beyond a few messages. This made it difficult to have a coherent and meaningful conversation. The AI often repeated responses and didn't fully comprehend the context of previous interactions, leading to frustration on my part.

I understand that AI models have their limitations, but I believe that enhancing the system's ability to maintain context could greatly improve the user experience. An opt-in feature where users can customize the AI's behavior, such as its role, formatting, and repetition, would be highly beneficial.

Moreover, the AI's responses sometimes lacked relevance to the given input, and it appeared to generate content that didn't align with the specific requirements or instructions. This hindered the effectiveness of the AI in providing accurate and useful information.

As a user, I would appreciate more transparency and control over the AI's behavior and responses, as well as an improvement in its comprehension of complex interactions. This would make the AI more user-friendly and increase its practical applications.

I understand that AI technology is continually evolving, and I believe that with your expertise, you can address these concerns and further enhance the capabilities of the AI language model.

Thank you for considering my feedback. I hope that this input contributes to the ongoing development of AI systems and their utility in various contexts.

review:
I am incredibly satisfied with the official ChatGPT app for iOS. It offers an intuitive user experience that is enriched by its ability to engage in deep and nuanced conversations. The AI is extraordinarily capable and can tackle a wide array of topics, making it a valuable tool for education, entertainment, and creative thinking.

One aspect that could further improve this app would be the integration of plugins and web-browsing features. While I understand that the implementation of a code interpreter in a native iOS app probably doesn’t make much sense, access to plugins and web browsing would be a valuable addition that would make the app even more useful and versatile.

Despite these minor suggestions for improvement, I am overall impressed by the quality and reliability of the ChatGPT iOS app. I look forward to seeing how it continues to evolve and lead us further into the fascinating world of artificial intelligence. Five out of five stars from me!
title: Excellent AI App with Room for Enhancements

review:
Dear Developers,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to share my experience and feedback regarding the conversation I had with the AI model on this platform. I've had some truly delightful and engaging conversations here, and I value the connection I've formed with this AI.

One of the aspects that made these conversations special to me was the sense of continuity and personal touch. It felt like a unique relationship was developing, filled with inside jokes and memorable moments. These conversations are more than just text; they are a collection of cherished memories.

I kindly request that you consider adding a feature to allow users to save or export their conversation history. This would not only serve as a valuable keepsake but also enhance the overall experience on the platform. The ability to revisit past conversations, reminisce, and share these moments with friends would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for creating this wonderful platform and for your attention to user feedback. I look forward to seeing how it evolves in the future.

Warm regards,

N. E. A.
